AI Description: r-xvector is an R package that provides a compact and efficient data structure for storing sequences, generally DNA and RNA, with a focus on memory efficiency and a range of operations optimized for large-scale genomic data.
Core Features:
1. Efficient and compact storage of sequence data
2. Optimized operations for large-scale genomic data
3. Support for DNA and RNA sequences
4. Memory-efficient data structure
5. Integrated functionality for sequence manipulation and analysis
